results.overview: Blown Away tells the story of Jimmy Dove who works for the Boston bomb squad. Shortly after Dove leaves the force his partner is killed by a bomb that Dove thinks might have been made by someone he knows.
results.title: Blown Away

results.overview: After her mother is killed by a car bomb, a 17-year-old girl lives a reckless and decadent lifestyle. She begins having sex with a boy who works at a local ski resort. He falls in love, and she tells him of her suspicions that her strict father was responsible for her mother's death and wants him to help her out of her situation. He must decide whether she's telling the truth or using him to her own ends.
results.title: Blown Away

results.original_title: Blown Away - Music, Miles and Magic
results.overview: A documentary about two friends travelling around the world with only basic things, a sailing boat and a school bus. On their way they are trying to gather and record the music of every country they visit.
results.title: Blown Away - Music, Miles and Magic

results.overview: A mother must wage war against her gangster husband who took their child away from her.
results.title: Blown Away

results.overview: A boy passionate about aviation witnesses a balloon fly away and gets an idea.
results.title: Blown Away

results.overview: Featuring interviews with five young career people who have disabilities, director Sharon Greytak questions the general public's attitudes toward physical disability and our perceptions of the disabled as somehow either weaker or more courageous than the non-disabled.
results.title: Weirded Out and Blown Away

results.overview: A tragic tale of life, death and the undead as a zombie remembers his lost love. A non linear story that unfolds in reverse chronology.
results.title: Blown Away

results.original_title: Carrie Underwood: The Blown Away Tour Live
results.overview: Pollstar's Top Female Country Touring Artist of 2012, six-time Grammy-winner Carrie Underwood brings her sold-out Blown Away Tour to DVD. Filmed in concert this past March, The Blown Away Tour: Live includes a dozen of Carrie's #1 singles, with such favorites as 'Before He Cheats,' 'Jesus, Take the Wheel,' 'Two Black Cadillacs,' and the album title track that inspired her tour name, 'Blown Away.'
results.title: Carrie Underwood: The Blown Away Tour Live

results.overview: A rural Iranian school is conducted in a tent. A man, apparently a school inspector, visits the class and asks the students to answer several questions. The man then explains that he is merely a passerby who wanted to know about the school. The teacher then asks a student to tell the man about the time the wind blew the school away.
results.title: The School That Was Blown Away
